A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What a train wreck of a movie. I am truly disappointed with TLJ. I am from the original generation of SW fans. I understand that SW cannot always revolve around Luke\, Han\, and Leia. I know the generation gap needs to be bridged and new characters must be introduced. I admire the new generation of heroes\, Rey\, Finn and Poe. Even amongst criticism\, I enjoyed TFA and considered it to be a great opportunity to introduce new characters and storylines. However\, after watching TLJ\, I'm beginning to have second thoughts. Prior to TLJ\, I had no idea who Rian Johnson was. Well\, I do now! If this person has anything to do with future SW projects you can count me out. He has effectively ruined the legacy of Luke Skywalker and quite possibly the entire franchise.
